website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for deodorizing pads that should provide several months of effectiveness.
pros: Infused with a fresh linen scent in the materials that will last a long time
Materials inside the pads pull moisture away to prevent additional odors from forming
Has a figure-8 shape that should keep it inside the gloves effectively
cons: Pads are a bit smaller than some others, so may not be as effective for larger sized gloves

customer_reviews.title: I personally did not like smell, hard to describe it but made me ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not like smell, hard to describe it but made me think of some type of cleaner that you would use in the bathroom.... and it is "Very Strong". i'm sure it works if you don't mind the smell. only used a few times for the reason stated, it took about 2 months for the smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: G E

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my entire duffle bag fresh while in my gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I expected it to help keep my gloves fresh, but as an added bonus it keeps my entire duffle bag fresh!! I've used other products like this before and they have always been better than nothing, but didn't actually work well. I would stuff a dryer sheet in them along with the glove deodorizers, but with this one I don't need to and its still strong enough to keep my duffle bag smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: nelsnat

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky boxing gloves for me!
customer_reviews.text: My boxing gloves were SOOOOOO bad. I didn't even want to put them on because they made my hands smell so bad. I got these bad boys and it was like night and day. It's been about 2 months and I've noticed the deodorizers are starting to have less smell, so I will be buying another set here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Roze Gritten

customer_reviews.title: Great, but overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Wow - a bit overpowering when you first get these, but I guess maybe that means they will last a long time. I will update after I have for a while.
customer_reviews.author: R. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Could not stand laundry smell.
customer_reviews.text: The fresh laundry smell almost made me hurl. It's smells like fake waxy soap. And they are not larger than Meister ones.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I have them in all my gloves. Keeps them dry and smelling great. Will be the only one I use from now on
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good at deodorizing and moisture absorption!! Good size. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: Large and long enough to fill gloves comfortably. Great scent.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Wassom

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: Great deodorizer for my boxing gloves...the smell is a little over powering but my gloves do smell nice instead of that stinky, sweaty smell!
customer_reviews.author: GolsMom03

customer_reviews.title: I liked the mister glove ones better
customer_reviews.text: They do their job but they are not bigger than the other glove deodorizers i have used. I liked the mister glove ones better.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested I order these, because I was boxing 2 to 3 times a week and my gloves were never getting a break! These inserts smell amazing, and are so easy to use - great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. No more weird aerosols to try and get ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. No more weird aerosols to try and get the smell out of my gloves and bag. Slipping these into my boxing gloves saves me a lot of hassle and time. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I actually get compliments on how nice my gloves smell
customer_reviews.text: I actually get compliments on how nice my gloves smell! I hang up my gloves in our dog's sleeping area and it makes that room smell good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my gloves and they keep smelling fresh for several uses after every insert.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Used
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Deodorizer!! Easy to use, and one pair in my gloves keeps them, my wraps and my whole gym bag smelling great! Very Durable for those of us who are at the gym every day. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I workout 5 days a week. These deodorizers keep my gloves smelling like clean laundry. I hot a second set for back up. But really have no need. Still strong fresh smell after two months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mace

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my gloves, makes it all smell so much better
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Manners

customer_reviews.title: Best Glove Dogs I've Found!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove deodorizers! Fresh linen scent and they keep my gloves dry and fresh. My handwraps get a benefit too, even after going an hour in my gloves. Good quality design and stitching as well - they won't break down on you or become separated from the strap.
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Very strong so recommend when not in use to put in ziplock bag. Great if you have sweaty gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Diana FB

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: So far awesome!! Gonna buy a pair for my shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Alt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These claim to be the biggest glove deodorizers filling out the gloves, which isn't even remotely close to being true. The end circle part is the only part that holds any of the filling as falls down from the rope end. They are small, short and thin. The scent is fairly faint after first couple days. The worst thing is that 2 days later my boxing gloves are still wet, so the moisture is not being sucked up. I have used 2 other brands, so I have ones to compare to as well. Meister glove deodorizers are by far the best, biggest, lasting scent, and keeping gloves dry! Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My gloves used to smell and I couldn't get them fresh. This product works perfectly. My gloves are fresh and stay fresh. Ill be buying more
customer_reviews.author: boris jumper

product_meta.title: Glove Deodorizer for Boxing and All Sport - 20% Larger Than Any Other Glove Dog - Unique Shape Absorbs More Stink and Keeps Glove Fresh (One Size, Fresh Linen)
product_meta.description:
Galaxy S9 Plus Screen Protector Glass, 3D Curved [Tempered Glass] Screen Protector for Galaxy S9 Plus [Case Friendly]

IMPORTANT NOTE:This model only for Galaxy Galaxy S9 Plus

Real Tempered Glass
Made of real tempered glass that protects the original screen from shattering, with an industry leading hardness of 9H, just below diamond with a hardness of 10H.

Waterproof and oil-proof
96% High-definition clear hydrophobic and oleophobic coating can prevent the water and from scattering. Water and oil can be wiped away very easily.

Silicone Bubble-free Adhesive
Adheres to the phone's screen without any gaps or bubbles, leaving the touch sensitivity unaffected.



Ultra-clear Screen
96% High-definition clear hydrophobic and oleophobic screen case coating protects against sweat and oil residue from fingerprints.

Easy installation
The glass screen protector can be easily installed without bubble and and removed without residue.

Package Include:

2 x Tempered glass screen protector
2 x Cleaning Wipes
2 x Dust Removal Tape
1 x Packing box

Attention:
The screen protector come with a cleaning kit. Please make sure keep the environment clean and remember not to fold the tempered glass film when installing.
feature_bullets: 【Multiple Protections】It adopts premium quality AGC glass materials, thus creating an oil resistant, anti-fingerprint, Highly durable and scratch resistant surface that is easier to clean and protect against dirt, dust and sweat effectively.
【3D Full Coverage】With precise cutouts and unique 3D Curved full coverage cutting technology, it fits for the contours of your phone without warping and lifting.

【High Definition & Zero Delay】99% transparency and high definition allows an optimal natural viewing experience and keeps the bright image quality. Ultra thin-0.3mm thickness maintain the original sensitivity and comfortable touch feeling.

【Easy Installation】With the installation steps and perfect fit design, it promises a super easy, frustration-free and bubble-free installation. Automatically attaches to the screen without annoyed bubbles and removed without residue.

【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】Our products are guaranteed to give you 100% satisfaction in every way for 180 days from the date of purchase. If you are not completely satisfied, email us and you will receive a replacement or refund.
